entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few rain showers and wet flurries ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of thunderstorms late this morning and this afternoon. Snow level rising to 800 metres near noon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of thunderstorms. Snow level 800 metres. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
